validationRules.block_id: Required - Unique identifier for the block
validationRules.icon: Required - 'fontAwesome' for FA icons or 'Ctm-svg' for custom images/SVG
validationRules.fIcon: Required when icon='fontAwesome' - FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fas fa-star')
validationRules.isvg.url: Required when icon='Ctm-svg' - URL to custom image/SVG file
validationRules.iAlign.md: left, center, or right - Controls horizontal alignment
validationRules.iColor: Color behavior depends on iview: default=icon color, stacked=background, framed=icon+border
validationRules.ihColor: Hover color - same behavior as iColor based on iview
validationRules.iseColor: Secondary color - stacked=icon color, framed=background color
validationRules.isehColor: Secondary hover color - matches iseColor behavior
validationRules.ioSize: Icon size in px - font-size for FontAwesome, max-width for custom SVG/images
validationRules.ioRotate: Rotation in degrees - 0-360 or negative values
validationRules.iopadd: Padding around icon - creates larger clickable/visual area
validationRules.ioBRed: Border radius - use 50% for perfect circles, px values for rounded squares
validationRules.ioBor: Border styling - only applies when iview='framed'
validationRules.globalPosition: CSS position property - relative, absolute, or fixed
validationRules.glohoriOffset: Horizontal offset when globalPosition is absolute/fixed
validationRules.gloverticalOffset: Vertical offset when globalPosition is absolute/fixed
validationRules.gloabhorizoOri: 'left' or 'right' - which edge to offset from horizontally (undefined = needs manual setting)
validationRules.gloabverticalOri: 'top' or 'bottom' - which edge to offset from vertically (undefined = needs manual setting)
validationRules.iLink.nofollow: Set to 'nofollow' for SEO no-follow links

warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è icon type must match icon source: 'fontAwesome' requires fIcon, 'Ctm-svg' requires isvg.url
‚ö†Ô∏è iColor behavior changes based on iview: default=icon, stacked=background, framed=icon+border
‚ö†Ô∏è iseColor only applies to iview='stacked' (icon color) or 'framed' (background color)
‚ö†Ô∏è ioBor border settings only work when iview='framed' (ignored for default/stacked)
‚ö†Ô∏è For perfect circles, use ioBRed=50% on all corners AND equal iopadd on all sides
‚ö†Ô∏è globalPosition=absolute requires parent container with position:relative
‚ö†Ô∏è gloabhorizoOri and gloabverticalOri are required when using globalPosition=absolute/fixed
‚ö†Ô∏è Custom SVG/images (icon='Ctm-svg') use ioSize as max-width, not font-size
‚ö†Ô∏è Rotation (ioRotate) applies to all iview types but may look odd with backgrounds
‚ö†Ô∏è Large iopadd values on stacked/framed views create large icon containers
‚ö†Ô∏è iLink makes entire icon clickable - ensure sufficient size for touch targets (44px min recommended)
‚ö†Ô∏è External links (target='_blank') should include nofollow='nofollow' for SEO best practices
commonMistakes: ‚ùå Using fIcon when icon='Ctm-svg' (FontAwesome class won't render custom image)
‚ùå Setting isvg.url when icon='fontAwesome' (custom image URL ignored)
‚ùå Expecting iseColor to work on iview='default' (only works on stacked/framed)
‚ùå Setting ioBor when iview='stacked' or 'default' (border only applies to framed)
‚ùå Using unequal ioBRed values expecting perfect circle (need 50% on all corners)
‚ùå Forgetting to set parent container to position:relative for absolute positioning
‚ùå Using very small ioSize values (<16px) that hurt accessibility and mobile usability
‚ùå Not setting responsive ioSize values (md/sm/xs) for mobile scaling
‚ùå Using rotation on stacked/framed icons without considering background rotation
‚ùå Setting iLink.target='_blank' without nofollow for external links (SEO penalty)
‚ùå Creating very small clickable icons (<24px) that are hard to tap on mobile
bestPractices: ‚úÖ Use iview='default' for simple decorative icons without backgrounds
‚úÖ Use iview='stacked' for premium icons with solid backgrounds (features, services)
‚úÖ Use iview='framed' for outlined icons with borders (minimal, elegant designs)
‚úÖ Set ioBRed=50% for perfect circular icons (both stacked and framed)
‚úÖ Use responsive ioSize values (md/sm/xs) to scale icons on different screens
‚úÖ Apply iopadd=15-25px for comfortable icon container sizing on stacked/framed
‚úÖ Use hover effects (ihColor, isehColor) for interactive icons and links
‚úÖ Keep icon sizes accessible: minimum 24px for decorative, 44px for clickable
‚úÖ Use FontAwesome for standard icons, Ctm-svg for brand logos or unique graphics
‚úÖ Left-align icons when they're inline with text or in lists
‚úÖ Use subtle rotation (10-15deg) for dynamic effect without disorientation
‚úÖ Set target='_blank' and nofollow='nofollow' for external link icons
‚úÖ Use globalPosition=absolute for corner badges, overlay indicators, floating elements
‚úÖ Test absolute positioning on all breakpoints (md/sm/xs) - may need different offsets
‚úÖ Use stacked icons with gradient backgrounds for modern, premium look
‚úÖ Keep iopadd consistent for uniform sizing across multiple icons
‚úÖ Use contrasting colors for icon vs background (WCAG AA: 4.5:1 ratio minimum)
‚úÖ Avoid very bright colors for large stacked icons (can be overwhelming)

default.description: Plain icon without background or border
default.bestFor: Decorative icons, list markers, simple accents, inline icons
default.padding: iopadd creates space around icon but no visual container

stacked.description: Icon with solid background fill (typically circular or rounded square)
stacked.bestFor: Feature highlights, service icons, call-outs, premium designs
stacked.padding: iopadd creates visible background container size
stacked.example: White check icon on purple circular background
stacked.note: Use ioBRed=50% for circles, px values for rounded squares

framed.description: Icon with border outline, transparent or filled background
framed.bestFor: Outlined icons, minimal designs, bordered buttons, elegant accents
framed.padding: iopadd creates space between icon and border
framed.example: Blue envelope icon with matching blue circular border
framed.note: Set iseColor='transparent' for hollow outline effect

relative.description: Default positioning in normal document flow
relative.useCase: Normal inline or block-level icon placement

absolute.description: Positioned relative to nearest positioned ancestor
absolute.requirements: Parent container must have position:relative, fixed, or absolute
absolute.offsets: glohoriOffset + gloverticalOffset define distance from edges
absolute.useCase: Corner badges, overlay icons, floating indicators
absolute.example: Notification bell in top-right corner: gloabhorizoOri='right', gloabverticalOri='top', offsets=10px

fixed.description: Positioned relative to viewport (stays visible on scroll)
fixed.offsets: glohoriOffset + gloverticalOffset define distance from viewport edges
fixed.useCase: Sticky icons, back-to-top buttons, fixed nav elements
fixed.warning: Fixed icons cover content on scroll - use sparingly

accessibilityNotes: ‚ôø Icons should be decorative or paired with descriptive text for screen readers
‚ôø For clickable icons, ensure 44√ó44px minimum touch target (combine ioSize + iopadd)
‚ôø Ensure sufficient color contrast between icon and background (4.5:1 WCAG AA)
‚ôø For stacked/framed, check contrast between iseColor and iColor
‚ôø Use semantic links when iLink is set (proper <a> tags generated)
‚ôø Don't rely on icon color alone to convey meaning (add text labels)
‚ôø Test with screen magnification - very small icons become unrecognizable
‚ôø For custom SVG icons, consider adding aria-label or title attributes
‚ôø Avoid excessive rotation that makes icons unrecognizable
‚ôø Test keyboard navigation for linked icons (Tab key focus)
‚ôø Ensure hover effects don't hide critical information (visual cues only)
performanceConsiderations: ‚ö° FontAwesome adds ~70KB font file if not already loaded in theme
‚ö° Custom SVG/images should be optimized: <20KB per icon, compressed
‚ö° Use SVG format instead of PNG/JPG for custom icons (scalable, smaller)
‚ö° Avoid very large ioSize values (>200px) for FontAwesome icons (rendering cost)
‚ö° Limit number of absolutely positioned icons (layout reflow cost)
‚ö° Gradient backgrounds on stacked icons are heavier than solid colors
‚ö° Rotation (transform) is GPU-accelerated but avoid on many icons simultaneously
‚ö° Test scroll performance with fixed positioned icons (can cause jank)
‚ö° Use icon sprites or symbol definitions for multiple custom SVG icons
‚ö° Avoid animating ioRotate via CSS (better to use dedicated animation blocks)
